name: messagefrombinarycode
description: You are taking part in an Escape Room challenge designed specifically for programmers. In your efforts to find a clue, you've found a binary code written on the wall behind a vase, and realized that it must be an encrypted message. After some thought, your first guess is that each consecutive `8` bits of the code stand for the character with the corresponding [extended ASCII code](https://www.ascii-code.com/).
